title: Stylish Melbourne Airport Stay Just 20 Minutes from CBD
description: Directly adjacent to Melbourne’s largest international travel hub - and just a 20-minute drive from the city’s iconic lattes and laneways - PARKROYAL Melbourne Airport offers guests the fastest way to touchdown from carousel to coffee and beyond. After days exploring the central business district or the nearby Sunbury wine region, return to classic pub fare and runway views at Bar Airo or savour the perfect mid-trip dip in the hotel’s shimmering indoor pool.
offer_address: Arrival Drive, Melbourne Airport, Tullamarine 3045, Victoria, Australia

title: Convenient Melbourne Airport Hotel 20 Minutes from CBD with Restaurant & Fitness Centre
description: Experience the convenience of a stay at Mantra Melbourne Airport, a modern retreat ideally positioned minutes from the terminals. Perfect for a seamless layover, or as your Melbourne base, the hotel is just 20 minutes from the CBD. Discover shopping and museums before retreating to your modern room and savouring a hearty meal at the onsite restaurant. For those seeking relaxation, the hotel also boasts a sleek fitness centre and a heated indoor pool.
offer_address: 2 Trade Park Drive, Tullamarine, Victoria, 3043, Australia
